certification.title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
certification.description:
Completed six AI modules successfully, enhancing my expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, NLP, AI Ethics, and more. These modules have been a wonderful learning experience, enabling me to understand AI and its applications in real life in a better way.

Completed Modules:
1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
2. Natural Language Processing and Its Applications
3. Machine Learning and Deep Learning
4. AI Ethics
5. Run AI Models with IBM Watson Studio
6. Your Future in AI: The Job Landscape

certification.title: SQL for Data Science
certification.description:
This experience exposed me to the basics of ML—data preprocessing, model construction, evaluation metrics, and applications in real life.

Likely Learned:
1. Supervised & Unsupervised Learning – Getting to know algorithms such as Linear Regression, Decision Trees, and Clustering.
2. Data Preprocessing – Data handling for missing values, feature engineering, and data normalization.
3. Real-World Applications – Applying to actual-world datasets, training models, and improving performance.

achievements.title: State-Level IdeaGo Competition
achievements.description:
1. Conceptualized and developed a supervised UAV-based surveillance system aimed at monitoring hazardous or restricted environments.
2. Integrated real-time video streaming and basic object detection to enhance situational awareness during surveillance operations.
3. Focused on safety protocols and remote control features to minimize human exposure in dangerous scenarios.
4. Collaborated in a multidisciplinary team to design, test, and present the project in a competitive academic setting.
5. Secured 3rd place among several teams in a 2020 competition for innovation and practical application in drone-based hazard management.

experience.title: Saisha Infotech Intern (Internship, 5-July-2021 to 17-July-2021)
experience.description:
1. Gained hands-on experience with splicing techniques used for connecting optical fiber cables efficiently.
2. Learned the process of assembling fiber optic cables, ensuring proper alignment and signal transmission.
3. Understood the internal hardware and components of networking routers through practical exposure.
4. Explored various fiber optic and networking products developed and manufactured by the company.
5. Observed and participated in quality control and testing procedures to ensure optimal performance of networking equipment.

experience.title: DRDO – Robotics Simulation Intern (10 Jan 2024 – 10 Jun 2024, 6 months)
experience.description:
1. Simulated UR5 and UR10 robotic arms within the PyBullet physics engine for industrial task environments.
2. Integrated custom forward and inverse kinematics models to ensure precise joint control and end-effector positioning.
3. Developed reinforcement learning (RL)-based agents to enable autonomous manipulation tasks using Gym and Ravens frameworks.
4. Designed and validated behavior policies for object picking, placing, and tool-use scenarios in a virtual factory setup.
5. Conducted performance testing and iterative refinement of models to ensure stability, accuracy, and adaptability across tasks.

experience.title: DRDO – Reinforcement Learning Engineer (1 April 2025 - Present)
experience.description:
1. Developed realistic quadruped robotic simulations using ROS2, Webots, and Isaac Sim to model locomotion and environment interaction.
2. Implemented sensor integration and control architectures to simulate real-world robotic perception and actuation.
3. Explored and evaluated swarm robotics algorithms for cooperative behavior among multiple quadrupeds and drones.
4. Simulated aerial-ground coordination scenarios to study task distribution, communication, and path planning.
5. Conducted comparative analysis of simulation frameworks to identify trade-offs in scalability, fidelity, and computational performance.

projects.title: Custom UAV Hexacopter from Scratch (2 Years)
projects.description:
1. Assembled a fully operational UAV from scratch using the Pixhawk 2.4.8 flight controller, ensuring proper integration of IMU, GPS, ESCs, and power distribution board.
2. Executed detailed PID tuning and ESC throttle calibration to optimize flight stability and responsiveness.
3. Integrated real-time sensor data streams, including GPS and IMU, for autonomous navigation and environmental awareness.
4. Independently managed the complete electrical system, including wiring, power management, and safety mechanisms.
5. Ensured structural integrity through precise frame balancing, motor alignment, and aerodynamic optimization for consistent performance.

projects.title: Hexacopter Simulation with YOLOv8 Human Detection (4 months)
projects.description:
1. Developed a UAV (Hexacopter) simulation environment in PyBullet, enabling physics-based flight dynamics and control.
2. Integrated real-time object detection using YOLOv8 to process aerial imagery from the simulated UAV camera.
3. Designed mission logic for autonomous search-and-detect behavior in complex environments, mimicking disaster relief scenarios.
4. Implemented dynamic obstacle and human target placement to evaluate UAV performance under varying conditions.
5. Validated the system’s detection accuracy and navigation efficiency in simulated rescue missions using custom test cases.

projects.title: Stocks Price Predictor
projects.description:
1. Technical Features:

i. The repository offers a comprehensive web application built with Streamlit for analyzing Indian stocks (NSE).
ii. Key features include real-time stock price tracking, historical data analysis, technical and fundamental analysis, and machine learning-based stock price prediction using Random Forest Regression.

2. Machine Learning Integration:

i. Implements a Random Forest Regression model with high accuracy (96.46% training and 93.22% testing).
ii. The model achieves low RMSE (Root Mean Squared Error): ₹82.74 (train) and ₹127.91 (test), making it reliable for predictions.

3. Analysis Tools:

i. Includes various analysis options: SMA (Simple Moving Average), RSI (Relative Strength Index), and MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence) indicators.
ii. Provides sentiment analysis using NLTK's VADER sentiment analyzer for interpreting news data.

4. Data Sources and Dependencies:

i. Data is fetched from Yahoo Finance (yfinance) and Google News (gnews).
ii. Built with Python and relies on libraries such as scikit-learn, numpy, pandas, ta, and plotly.

5. Setup and Usage:

i. The application can be set up by installing dependencies listed in requirements.txt and running the main Streamlit app (Stock_dashboard.py).
ii. The interactive dashboard provides visualization and analysis tools accessible locally via http://localhost:8501.
